archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0807
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want all customer facing system users to have visibility over account access logs to eliminate unethical behaviour with customer accounts

properties.value: Anyone going to a customer account should see who previously visited the account. This relates to VF employees. There should be an exception for people of a set role (who are possibly doing investigations of frauds) OOTB extension is needed to register Activiti everytime a user access customer data (enters 360 view of the customer)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
